moderation: Allows you to mass delete messages in your server. DEFAULT: 25 MSGS

!purge @user
!purge [number]
!purge bots [number]
!purge commands [number]
!purge mentions [number]
!purge images [number]
!purge links [number]
!purge invites [number]
!purge text [number]
!purge embeds [number]
!purge emojis [number]
!purge startswith [content]
!purge endswith [content]
!purge includes [content]
!purge match [content]
tower: Purchase a weapon from the weapons dealer.
Begin your adventure up the tower.
info: Links a URL to the avatar of the mentioned user.
Displays info about the mentioned channel.
Shows the owner of this bot.
social: Displays a random gif based on the provided tag or category.
utility: Displays info of the requested anime.
Display the lyrics of the requested song.
Displays info of the requested manga.
Translates the text into the specified language.
Look up a term on Urban Dictionary. (NSFW)
Displays weather info on the provided city.
